Class Diagram

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              Diagram
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class Diagram
extends javax.swing.JComponent

This component displays a logic level diagram which can be obtained from a physical device or from a file. It also supports writing its content to a given file.

Component size changes with the size of the diagram. Therefore it should only be used from within a JScrollPane.

Version:
0.0.1
Author:
Michael "Mr. Sump" Poppitz
See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

readFromDevice

public void readFromDevice(Device device)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
Tries to diagram data from the given Device. The device must already be configured properly.

Parameters:
device - the device to read from
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - passed trough from device

readFromFile

public void readFromFile(java.io.File file)
                  throws java.io.IOException
Reads diagram data from given file.

Parameters:
file - file to read diagram data from
Throws:
java.io.IOException - when reading from file failes

writeToFile

public void writeToFile(java.io.File file)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Writes diagram data to given file.

The file will contain 8 hex characters per line, thus encoding 32bits or channels per line.

Parameters:
file - file to write to
Throws:
java.io.IOException - when writing to file failes

zoomIn

public void zoomIn()
Zooms in by factor 2 and resizes the component accordingly.

zoomOut

public void zoomOut()
Zooms out by factor 2 and resizes the component accordingly.

public java.awt.Dimension getPreferredSize()
